definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
left and right hands/(fig.) capable assistant/right-hand man
glancing to left and right (idiom); to look all around
lit. to strike water right and left (idiom)/fig. to turn everything into gold/to have everything going one's way/to benefit from both sides

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the treatment and clinical diagnosis of right lower-abdominal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨右下腹包块的临床诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: S is a nil-extension of strong semilattice of right semigroup.
sentences.chinese: 为右群强半格的诣零理想扩张。

sentences.english: Left to right and so on and so on cock not send red crown to the centipede, they come in person to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 公鸡左等右等不见蜈蚣送红冠来，就亲自上门讨要。

sentences.english: We have been struck by lightning, the rear fuselage damaged, right elevator lost.
sentences.chinese: 我们遭到雷击，后机身被打坏，失去右升降舵。

sentences.english: The lymphoedema of the right lower limb gradually subsided with softening of the skin after operation.
sentences.chinese: 右下肢的淋巴水肿在手术后逐渐改善并且皮肤变软。

sentences.english: But the 38-year-old right-hander hasn't completely come to terms with the decision.
sentences.chinese: 但这位38岁的右投并未完全在此决定上妥协。

sentences.english: The right peddle of your bicycle has come loose; you'd better fix it.
sentences.chinese: 你的自行车右脚踏板松动了，最好修一修。

sentences.english: The gastroepiploic artery was used in 1 (1. 5% ) patient.
Cradle it with your left hand and apply slight pressure.
sentences.chinese: 用左手抱住右上臂并对其稍稍加压。

sentences.english: The plane rolled left and then rolled right. Then he caught an edge of his wing on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飞机时而向左时而向右滚动，最终机翼触地。

sentences.english: Place your right toe in line with your left heel.
sentences.chinese: 把右脚趾与左脚跟排在一直线上。

sentences.english: It is a left lead followed by a right cross.
sentences.chinese: 一个左直拳接着是一个右交叉拳。

sentences.english: The triple-point trajectory characterizing Mach reflection locates downstream of the right corner in the horizontal branch.
sentences.chinese: 水平支管中马赫反射三波点迹线始于右尖点下游。
